channel.title: CVE Feed for jevnet -- Easy Pixels
channel.description: The latest CVEs for jevnet -- Easy Pixels

item.title: CVE-2024-5479|2024-07-29T18:08:15.610Z -- jevnet -- easy%20pixels
item.description: The Easy Pixels plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via plugin settings in all versions up to, and including, 2.13 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-5479|2024-07-09T08:33:01.822Z -- jevnet -- easy%20pixels
item.description: The Easy Pixels plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via plugin settings in all versions up to, and including, 2.13 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
